AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Market assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days setting up multiple stands in a market owned by [PAWN_possessive] parents. While [PAWN_nameDef] learned bartering skills, meeting the many different travelers inspired [PAWN_objective] to set off and adventure on [PAWN_possessive] own. [PAWN_pronoun] would often build crude bases made out of wood from the shop stands, far away from home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Discordant singer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved music with a passion, and decided to persue a career in singing. Unfortunately, because [PAWN_pronoun] singing voice was the equivalent of cheese-grating a tea kettle, [PAWN_pronoun] would inadvertently repel strangers, neighbors, friends, pets and wildlife, subsequently isolating [PAWN_objective]. Despite this, [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents supported [PAWN_pronoun] dream with open arms and thick ear muffs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Budding florist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After a traumatic death in the family, [PAWN_nameDef] began to use botany to cope with the loss. [PAWN_pronoun] began to learn more about herbs and flowers, studying all sorts of foliage around the school and [PAWN_possessive] own yard, at the cost of not conversing much with friends or family. With [PAWN_possessive] growing knowledge of plants, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to work towards a future involving [PAWN_possessive] own botany/florist shop.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dreemurr rascal
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Living in a forest village, [PAWN_nameDef] had a decent childhood filled with misadventures and learning moments. Twining twigs and vines into a tightrope to cross a small chasm, befriending a rat, getting chased by the town elders for harmless pranks, [PAWN_nameDef] has plenty of stories to tell, but never found a particular skill to spark [PAWN_possessive] interests.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gatherer Slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up in slavery, [PAWN_nameDef] foraged for fresh fruit and vegetables, and was forced into learning how to cook for [PAWN_possessive] superiors. Never allowed to talk, [PAWN_pronoun] almost lost [PAWN_objective] voice. Still, [PAWN_nameDef] clung to hope that [PAWN_pronoun] would be freed, and eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] was.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dusty dreemurr
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] loved digging. [PAWN_pronoun] would bring a toy shovel everywhere [PAWN_pronoun] went, and would often come home with fur covered in dirt, dust and sometimes mud. [PAWN_possessive] mother decided to introduce fossils to [PAWN_pronoun], and taught [PAWN_pronoun] how to make paper mâché fossils to bury and re-find after a few days.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Human fanatic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a coalition city with no humans. So when a human family obtained housing rights and moved right next to [PAWN_nameDef]'s home, [PAWN_pronoun] quickly became invested in learning all about the human species. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly became friends with the family's child, and often had playdates where [PAWN_pronoun] would ask questions nonstop, and also had some history lessons from the human parents.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Starry-Eyed stargazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Stars have always fascinated [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] would chart the stars above [PAWN_objective] on a sketchbook. Sadly, [PAWN_pronoun]'d always lose track of which [PAWN_pronoun] had drawn, and usually ended up with a mess of star scribbles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Soup kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having a sickly parent to care for, [PAWN_nameDef] practiced making soups with herbs that would help aid [PAWN_possessive] parent's health. Since [PAWN_nameDef] was busy with school, [PAWN_pronoun] would ask neighbors to help deliver food to [PAWN_possessive] home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shaggy rebel
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't enjoy being told what to do, so when [PAWN_pronoun] was asked to keep [PAWN_objective] fur clean and brushed, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to not trim [PAWN_possesive] hair at all, and would always resist [PAWN_possesive] parents' attempts at a haircut. After [PAWN_pronoun] was over that phase, [PAWN_pronoun] finally shaved [PAWN_possessive] fur and made small blankets out of it for fun.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Uptight dreemurr
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't born into royalty or a strict family, but [PAWN_pronoun] still acted like [PAWN_pronoun] was. [PAWN_nameDef] would always get classwork done, did chores diligently, and never played outside from fear of getting dirt in the house. Unfortunately, at school [PAWN_pronoun] would get made fun of for being a "mega nerd," and became an outcast.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thrumbo enthusiast
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Some Dreemurrs wanted to become farmers and chefs growing up. [PAWN_nameDef] wanted to become a thrumbo. Why not? After finding a library book on far-off exotic creatures, [PAWN_pronoun] was encapsulated by the thrumbo. Thus, [PAWN_pronoun] crafted a crude paper thrumbo horn, painted [PAWN_possessive] belly fur purple and would always prance around acting like one, despite not knowing how they moved or sounded.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Theater kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved nothing more than being on stage, but was usually too shy to take lead roles. [PAWN_pronoun] was content being a background character, or a backup singer in musicals, and showed potential as a successful actor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lore deliverer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Similar to a newspaper deliverer, [PAWN_nameDef] rode around town tossing books full of lore and history onto the doorsteps of [PAWN_possessive] neighbors. [PAWN_pronoun] cracked one of these books open once out of curiosity and recieved good knowledge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the slums on an Urbworld. During a government sweep of the planet, [PAWN_pronoun] was separated from [PAWN_possessive] family and placed into an orphanage. [PAWN_pronoun] made a few friends at the cost of making a lot of enemies. Before [PAWN_pronoun] left the orphanage, [PAWN_possessive] friends taught [PAWN_objective] valuable information they had stolen from the Headmaster's office.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fallen child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While exploring the base of a mountain, [PAWN_nameDef] accidentally tripped and fell into a large cavern. [PAWN_pronoun] was lucky enough to land on a large flowerbed but wasn't able to move [PAWN_possessive] legs. Calling out for help, something was approaching. It was a female Dreemurr, who helped [PAWN_nameDef] into a nearby home where she took care of [PAWN_objective] until his leg was healed. [PAWN_nameDef] lived with her for some time before deciding [PAWN_pronoun] had places to be. [PAWN_pronoun] promised her that [PAWN_pronoun] would use everything she had shown [PAWN_objective] while [PAWN_pronoun] lived underground.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Snail hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father always took [PAWN_obective] out to the garden after it rained and showed [PAWN_nameDef] where the best snail hunting locations were. [PAWN_nameDef] liked to throw rocks at the snails and make them fall over.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Part-time librarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got a part-time job at [PAWN_possessive] local library. It paid fairly well and not too many people came in, so [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time there reading about fascinating topics like snails, how to cook snails, and how to be best friends with snails, among other non-snail related topics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hardware developer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was interested in technology at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] would go to the scrapyard every week to find anything [PAWN_pronoun] could use to create [PAWN_possessive] own little computers. The first thing [PAWN_pronoun] ever created was a handheld console that could only play Snail Pong, which is Pong but with a snail.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Small-town student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small town with [PAWN_possessive] mother and father who encouraged [PAWN_objective] to do great things. [PAWN_nameDef] was top-of-the-class and almost never had any extra homework to do. This gave [PAWN_objective] a lot of free time to learn about the world outside of school.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Small-town student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small town with [PAWN_possessive] mother and father who encouraged [PAWN_objective] to do great things. As hard as [PAWN_pronoun] tried, [PAWN_pronoun] was hardly above passing. [PAWN_pronoun] did enjoy fighting, however, and often fought other willing students behind the school for money or scraps of food. [PAWN_nameDef] loved this so much, [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to never be smart.
